description: This file defines the 'AppShellComponent', an Angular component responsible for rendering the main layout including a sidebar, navigation, user authentication controls, and a router outlet for viewing child components.

classes.name: AppShellComponent
classes.description: Main layout component for the application including sidebar toggle, user login state, and navigation.

methods.name: toggleSidebar
methods.description: Toggles the collapsed state of the sidebar.

methods.name: isAuth
methods.description: Checks if the user is authenticated by verifying presence of a token via AuthService.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by calling the logout method of AuthService.
